HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"obama wants 100,000+ of same muslims that bombed brussels & paris, same muslim "refugees" raping & killing Europeans"
"#SignsYoureABernieSupporter If you believe your degeneracy would be excepted by socialism/communism. #FeelTheBern "
"Why haven’t any women landed on the moon? Because they’re still trying to park"
""Gay Christian" is not in God's vocabulary nor is the concept found in His word, the Bible."
"The problem with WN and Pro-White groups is that too few are also Pro-Racist. Racism promotes a positive racial identity and pride."
"I would never want a gay son. Smh I don't care if it sounds like I'm judging."
"#SignsYoureABernieSupporter you are a fat, lazy, good-for-nothing degenerate with an amazingly tiny dick."
"Racism: A positive feeling of racial identity and racial pride."
"Hold an MD responsible for abortion but the let the woman off for killing her offspring -- an intellectually dishonest position. #WhyWeLose"
"I'd. Break down if my son came out the Closet saying he was gay cuz I'd feel. Like I failed as a father"
